DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Worry Scale Past Week How Often Thought about Chances of Cancer Recurrence Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation during the past week of how often they have thought about their chances of getting cancer (again), using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Worry Scale Past Week How Often Thought about Chances of Cancer Recurrence Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An 8-item questionnaire that utilizes a 4-point Likert scale to assess concerns about developing cancer or cancer recurrence, and the impact of these concerns on daily functioning, among individuals at risk for hereditary cancer._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about how often an individual thought about their chances of cancer recurrence._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An 8-item questionnaire that utilizes a 4-point Likert scale to assess concerns about developing cancer or cancer recurrence, and the impact of these concerns on daily functioning, among individuals at risk for hereditary cancer.

Concepts.definition: An 8-item questionnaire that utilizes a 4-point Likert scale to assess concerns about developing cancer or cancer recurrence, and the impact of these concerns on daily functioning, among individuals at risk for hereditary cancer.

Property.preferredName: Past Week How Often Thought about Chances of Cancer Recurrence Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about how often an individual thought about their chances of cancer recurrence.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: How Often Thought about Chances of Cancer Recurrence
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual thought about their chances of cancer recurrence.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from Never to Almost always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created VD that differs from validated measure for Alliance per K. Laumann - smt 12/17/2020
